meanings.definition: A unit of cultural information that can be passed from one individual to another.
meanings.sent1: The story about the hero's journey is a mems that has been shared for generations.
meanings.sent2: In our family, the tradition of baking cookies together is a cherished mems.
meanings.sent3: The joke about the talking dog became a popular mems at the office.
meanings.sent4: The mems of kindness can spread like wildfire, touching many hearts.
meanings.sent5: The mems of unity and peace resonated with people around the world.

meanings.definition: An element of a culture or system of behavior that may be considered to be passed from one individual to another by nongenetic means, especially imitation.
meanings.sent1: The dance moves from the music video became a mems among the students.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a tie to work was a mems that he picked up from his father.
meanings.sent3: The mems of speaking in a British accent at the party was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was infectious, becoming a mems that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The mems of generosity and sharing brought the community closer together.

meanings.definition: A humorous image, video, piece of text, etc., that is copied (often with slight variations) and spread rapidly by Internet users.
meanings.sent1: The cat memes on social media are a popular form of mems.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stop laughing at the hilarious mems her friend sent her.
meanings.sent3: The mems of the dancing baby never fails to make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The viral mems of the grumpy cat captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: Creating mems has become a fun way to share humor online.
